comments:
3.1.0 M2

Was editing a plugin.xml file and consistently started to get internal errors.
Several of the following exceptions were in the log. Closing and re-opening the
editor fixed the problem.

I got it today trying to add the translatable property. I won't do it. I move
back to previous usable build.
When this is fixed, I will do it.
